title: The Haunted Castle (restored) (1921, Dir: F.W. Murnau, German Expressionism, imdb score: 6.2)

sources.title: The Haunted Castle (restored) (1921, Dir: F.W. Murnau, German Expressionism, imdb score: 6.2)
sources.description: The Haunted Castle (1921), also known as Schloß Vogelöd: Die Enthullung eines Geheimnisses and Castle Vogeloed, is a silent chamber-drama directed by Friedrich Wilhelm Murnau. The film is a moody psychodrama, "blending multiple flashbacks and dream sequences with a gloomy atmosphere.... It is one of the earliest surviving works of (F. W. Murnau)." It was shot at the Babelsberg Studios in Berlin. The film's sets were designed by the art director Hermann Warm.
